main event: A farmer in South Wellington, Texas, observed an oval-shaped UFO emitting a low hum for about 20 to 30 minutes, which was not the first sighting of such objects in the area.
interesting points: The object was described as oval-shaped, about 20 inches in diameter, and emitted a low-level hum., The object was seen hovering at approximately 30 feet before moving off rapidly., The light from the object changed from white to reddish as it began to move., Previous reports indicated that the same farmer had observed similar objects multiple times., There were anecdotal claims that drawings of the object and its interior were available upon request.
sighted object: oval-shaped object emitting light and a low hum
witness description: A farmer with a high school education, considered reliable and stable by local contacts.
